works.complaint:
Dear Googlers,

from last 4 months few guys are running fake event page "Free Android  
Workshop" on facebook and they are collecting personal information from  
users their phone numbers, Government issued id card #(CNIC card) and
email  
addresses.

but recently few girls got junk calls from the creator of event page after
 
that we have verified their event from all of their expected locations as 

they mentioned in their event page event venue isn't decided but expected 

locations are mentioned but no one is hosting their event.
secondly lots of other users are also realized that this event page is  
fake, so you can read their comments for further verification! they are  
using it just for collecting our personal information.

now they have more than 1,100 peoples date they can misuse it that's why i
 
decide to report Google Abuse team.
